name: Grow The Fire
description:
(Sound starts Muted, go into Options!)

This game was made by @ApfeI and @Tronik for the GDL Jam. 

Survive in a cold wasteland by gathering wood and magic Gems.
[Controls]
Tab - Check fire levels
E - Inventory
Q - Quick Eat
F - Sit down during Blizzard
Left Shift - 5x  Click
Left Alt - 10x Click
